interestingsItems.name: Barranco
interestingsItems.description: A bohemian district known for its colorful streets, street art, and the iconic Bajada de los Baños.

interestingsItems.name: Mall Aventura SJL
interestingsItems.address: Av. Próceres de la Independencia 1636, San Juan de Lurigancho, Lima, Perú
interestingsItems.description: A shopping mall with a wide variety of stores, restaurants, and entertainment spaces.

interestingsItems.name: Caprichitos Las Flores SJL
interestingsItems.address: Av. Las Flores de Primavera, San Juan de Lurigancho, Lima, Perú
interestingsItems.description: A well-known pastry shop and café in San Juan de Lurigancho, famous for its desserts and sweets.

interestingsItems.name: Templo Los Olivos
interestingsItems.address: Av. Universitaria, Los Olivos, Lima, Perú
interestingsItems.description: An emblematic religious center in Los Olivos district, featuring impressive architecture.

interestingsItems.name: Parque del Amor
interestingsItems.description: A romantic park with a stunning view of the Pacific Ocean and the famous 'El Beso' sculpture.

interestingsItems.name: Parque de las Aguas
interestingsItems.address: Jr. Madre de Dios, Cercado de Lima, Lima, Perú
interestingsItems.description: A park with interactive water fountains and nighttime light and music shows.

interestingsItems.name: Cerro San Cristóbal
interestingsItems.address: San Juan de Lurigancho, Lima, Perú
interestingsItems.description: A hill with a panoramic view of Lima, popular for sightseeing and religious pilgrimages.

interestingsItems.name: Plaza de Armas de Lima
interestingsItems.description: The main square of Lima, surrounded by historic buildings such as the Government Palace and the Cathedral of Lima.
